PRODUCTS.TITLE: Recommended Products
PRODUCTS.SUBTITLE: Essential accessories to succeed in your creations
PRODUCTS.WHY_TEXT: These products are essential for creating your figurines: NTAG213 NFC stickers to encode your characters, coin cases to protect them, and the circle cutter for perfect cuts.
PRODUCTS.DELIVERY_TEXT: AliExpress links offer international delivery. Make sure to check delivery times and shipping costs for your region before ordering.
PRODUCTS.RECOMMENDATION_TEXT: Check out our recommended products to get everything you need for your creations.

PRODUCTS_LIST.NTAG213_DESC: Pack of 10 high-quality NFC stickers, compatible with all characters and vehicles. Essential for your creations.
PRODUCTS_LIST.COIN_CASES_DESC: Pack of 100 plastic coin cases (30mm diameter). Perfect for protecting and presenting your NFC figurines.
PRODUCTS_LIST.CIRCLE_CUTTER_DESC: Precision adjustable circle cutter, ideal for cutting your printouts perfectly. Makes clean, professional cuts.
